entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
